articles.title: OpenAI brings ChatGPT to your landline - TechCrunch
articles.description: OpenAI's AI-powered ChatGPT is coming to phones. No, not smartphones — landlines.
articles.content:
ChatGPT is coming to phones. No, not smartphones landlines. Call 1-800-242-8478 (1-800-CHATGPT), and OpenAI’s AI-powered assistant will respond as of Wednesday afternoon.

articles.title: Microplastics may be leading to lung and colon cancer, study shows - The Washington Post
articles.description: New research published Wednesday in the journal Environmental Science and Technology offers evidence that microplastics are harming human health.
articles.content:
When a car rolls down a freeway, a fine spray of microplastics spews out from its tires. When you wash your clothes, millions of tiny synthetic microfibers spill into waterways.

articles.title: Seed Oils Under Fire: Fact-Checking the Hype and Health Claims - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Despite claims of toxicity, seed oils are largely safe and beneficial in moderation. The refining process eliminates most harmful substances, although it also reduces beneficial antioxidants. The primary health concern is not the oils themselves but the moder…
articles.content:
Seed oils such as sunflower and grapeseed are not inherently toxic as claimed by some public figures and social media influencers.
